box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. 经济最初的均衡点，
此时S1 - I(x1) = 0 = NX，
即贸易均衡

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 340px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
2. 扩展性的财政政策导致国民储蓄的下降，国民储蓄从S2减少到了S1；
但是因为利率不变，所以投资仍然是I(x1)

switch.text: 2. 扩展性的财政政策导致国民储蓄的下降，国民储蓄从S2减少到了S1；...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 412px; margin-left: 356px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
3. NX = S2 - I(x1) < 0，
即出现了贸易赤字
